Netscape 4 72 Released

23 Feb 2000

Netscape has released version 4.72 of their popular Netscape Communicator package today.

Netscape has provided a release notes page for your platform where you can see what's new in 4.72. Since downloading from Netscape's FTP servers is always a painful experience, head on over to evolt's browser archive and download the newest version for yourself!
